title: Animal Super Senses
overview: Why do snakes have split tongues? Why do elephants sport massive ears, or moths flaunt feathery antennae? Every bizarre feature in the animal kingdom has a purpose, honed through evolution to ensure survival.In Super Senses, we delve into the incredible sensory adaptations that help animals communicate, navigate, find food, and stay safe. From bats with uniquely shaped ears to the astonishing tools of nature's most fascinating creatures, this series uncovers the extraordinary ways animals experience and interact with the world.
